name: PolyZ-Survival: Down to Earth
description:
Developed for participation in Epic MegaJam.

There are too many undead crawling out of the earth. Get them down to earth!
Fight the zombie waves and bring the undead down to earth!
Collect cash and buy better weapons. With every wave it gets harder!

I've used the following assets from the UE4 Marketplace for development:
- First Person Shooter Kit
- Advanced Locomotion System V3
-  Rifle Animset Pro
- Pistol Animset Pro
- Advanced Menu System
- POLYGON - Battle Royale
- POLYGON - City Zombies
+ Zombie-Animations from https://www.mixamo.com/

To play, you only need to unpack the zip file and run the PolyZ.exe!
